pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of Mexico, Andrés Manuel López Obrador | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador, who called to offer his congratulations to the Prime Minister on his re-election.

The Prime Minister and President reaffirmed their commitment to close cooperation between Canada and Mexico, and discussed progress being made towards the ratification of the new North American Free Trade Agreement.

The two leaders also discussed the importance of working together to create economic opportunities in both countries.

The Prime Minister and President looked forward to working closely together on shared priorities.
